titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow spouses of uniformed service members to make contributions towards such member's Thrift Savings Fund account, and for other purposes.
To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow spouses of uniformed service members to make contributions towards such member's Thrift Savings Fund account, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill allows the spouse of a member of the uniformed services to contribute to the member's Thrift Savings Fund account from the spouse's retirement plan.
